Mr. President, finally, let's say good-bye to German Vazquez--a very  special…

…dying.

I am joined by Senators Hirono, Slotkin, Lujan, Murray, Durbin,  Whitehouse, Warnock, Klobuchar, Shaheen, Kaine, Rosen, Cortez Masto,  Alsobrooks, Kelly, Warren, Hassan, Schiff, Baldwin, Duckworth, Gallego,  Peters, Van Hollen, Sanders, Booker, Wyden, Merkley, Warner, Smith,  Padilla, Heinrich, Schatz, and Hickenlooper in this effort. …Oregonians, whom you have been  serving so well for so long.
